kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Register Keyword To Run On Failure
kw.doc: Sets the keyword to execute when a Selenium2Library keyword fails.
kw.msg: Failed Steps will be run on failure.

kw.name: Wait And Click On Element
kw.doc: Wait till 30 sec and click if element found

kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.doc: Clicks an element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
